content.body: Hey I just merged https://github.com/tc39/ecma426/pull/149 -- thanks to Simon now if you enable GH pages in your fork, setting it to serve from the `gh-pages` branch, you'll get automatic PR previews at `<your-username>.github.io/<your fork>/<branch name>` :)
content.formatted_body: Hey I just merged https://github.com/tc39/ecma426/pull/149 -- thanks to Simon now if you enable GH pages in your fork, setting it to serve from the gh-pages branch, you'll get automatic PR previews at <your-username>.github.io/<your fork>/<branch name> :)
